name: mrcepid-filterbcf
title: FilterBCF
summary: Filter a target BCF according to parameters set by MRC Epidemiology

inputSpec.name: input_vcfs
inputSpec.label: list of input .bcf file(s)
inputSpec.help: List of input BCF files from mrcepid-splitbcf.

inputSpec.name: coordinates_name
inputSpec.label: Name of the output coordinates file
inputSpec.help: Name of the output coordinates file.

inputSpec.name: vep_cache
inputSpec.label: VEP cache from ENSEMBL
inputSpec.help: Pointer to the VEP cache stored on DNA nexus. Current default is v107

inputSpec.name: loftee_libraries
inputSpec.label: Precompiled LOFTEE resources
inputSpec.help: Pointer to the tar.gz file of loftee databases on DNA nexus

inputSpec.name: gnomad_maf_db
inputSpec.label: Precompiled gnomAD MAF database
inputSpec.help: Pointer to a precompiled .tsv format file of gnomAD AFs

inputSpec.name: revel_db
inputSpec.label: Precompiled REVEL score database
inputSpec.help: Pointer to a precompiled .tsv format file of REVEL scores

inputSpec.name: cadd_annotations
inputSpec.label: CADD annotations
inputSpec.help: Pointer to annotations used by CADD to compute variant deleteriousness scores.

inputSpec.name: precomputed_cadd_snvs
inputSpec.help: .tsv.gz file of all possible pre-computed SNVs in the GRCh38 human reference genome.

inputSpec.name: precomputed_cadd_indels
inputSpec.help: .tsv.gz file of all gnomAD v3.0 InDels in GRCh38 human reference coordinates.

outputSpec.name: output_veps
outputSpec.label: Output VEP annotations
outputSpec.help: Tabix indexed TSV file(s) with per-variant annotation information

outputSpec.name: output_per_samples
outputSpec.label: Output per sample consequence annotations
outputSpec.help: Per-sample variants with AF < 1e-3 for QC.

outputSpec.name: coordinates_file
outputSpec.label: Coordinates of each bcf processed by this job
outputSpec.help: Coordinates of each bcf processed by this job.
